extendedInfo.description: Get ready to be a crazy motorist! Run as fast as you can, perform flips to get bonus. Fresh art style, perfect physics, and lots of interesting details such like destructible motorbike & motorist, deadly bombs and etc.  You can even drag the rider around the map when he's off the bike. Letâs see who is on the high score board. Various tracks (c) 2010 - 2011 Djinnworks, licensed 2011 for MX Moto19 challenging tracks, 14 rally tracks and 3 game modes.More tracks are comming!FEATURES:Fabulous graphicsRealistic physicsFun ragdoll & destructible motorRace against your own ghost! (ghost will show the best/last ride)Different difficulty from easy to very hard

reviews.title: Very exciting
reviews.comment: I loved it I think its well worth 99\302\242 I wish there are more levels other wish very good keep it up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ridiculous
reviews.comment: Needs an internet connection to verify you purchased the game. Are you kidding me? I couldn\'t play the game on a flight because of that. I payed full price for this, just like everyone else, and can\'t even play it. I won\'t be paying a single cent for one of your games ever again. This is absolutely ridiculous.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not worth 10 cents
reviews.comment: Tilt control doesn\'t work at all with my HTC Desire, unplayable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Good game. Easy controls. Fun. Worth every dime.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More irritating than anything.
reviews.comment: Thought this would be a fun game like excite bike. Not so. Very rapidly devolves into an exercise in frustration, mostly due to sadistic level design.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but..
reviews.comment: What happened to the controls other than tilting? It\'s very annoying to tilt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: wont work offline
reviews.comment: fix the licencing! If you try to play it offline it says it needs to connect to validate or what ever and that if you do it will work offline \"for a number of days\". Thats pretty lame in itself, but even after starting it with wifi on (it works) it still will not work offline immediately after.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Accelerometer
reviews.comment: Not compatible with the DROID BIONIC\'s accelerometer. The game is landscape while the device has to be held portrait to work properly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worst piece of s#it ever!
reviews.comment: Not even worth the 10 cents I paid for it. Controls are worthless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This is a very fun game.  Very creative.  Physics are realistic enough yet fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too hard
reviews.comment: Gay and too hard the levels aren\'t fun and make me want to shoot myself in the face
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Awesome game. I used to be ranked in the top ten in normal and bomb modes, but now it says no connection when I try to access high scores, even on Wi-Fi
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Controls suck. You Die to easily, very frustrating and not even worth 10 cents
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lmao
reviews.comment: Just hold down the right side of the screen to accelerate and seriously...if you don\'t move your phone at all you will beat every level...deleted
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is a great game
reviews.comment: I been playing this game for some time now, while the graphics are not like many other games it makes up for it with its cool notebook background. If you have a few minutes to kill the this is the game to get...
reviews.author: Jos\303\251 Olivo

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love throwing around the guy after he fails! This is a good game for passing time levels are short and get more diffucult each time and very addicctive  I still play it after I beat it but recently it crapped up and it makes me play sideways like I have to turn my phone straight up for him to sit now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: Kinda fun, but the landscapes are awful and flat, and it also has ridiculous noises stolen from others things, like worms 2 I think.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: This is by far the worst game ever.. Its absolutly horribley difficult... Impossible to beat the later levels...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun and addicting
reviews.comment: Very addicting game. Great for when you need to kill a few minutes or a few hours. Casual game that offers features for hardcore gamers alike.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: This is your basic phone game, but I thought it was a lot of fun.  Did have a little bit of that \"ExciteBike\" chaos control which only adds to the frustration.  Fun little game to whip out here and there and get some entertainment value in.  (I got it during the Google App sale for 10 cents, so I consider it a solid purchase.)
reviews.author: A Google User
